column5: Some goodies i got for my birthday today, I also got some clothes and $$.     Has anybody used these baits?
i have used the swim bait shads in red  n white often for pike thought the ice jigging and done well    and HAPPY BIRTHDAY!
good lookin' birthday score. the great thing 'bout gettin' gear as a gift is that it's the perfect excuse to get out  and try it out right??  happy birthday mike
Happy birthday Mike Great birthday gift you got.... I'm sure that you will put it to good use  I've never use them before and cannot comment on those, sorry Leechman
Very nice gifts!  Happy Birthday Mike.
Happy B-Day man all the best. Nice looking presents there

I have a feeling about those goby's and minnow's. I think there going to work well, and the reviews on BPS are pretty good for all of those baits. I can't wait to go to BPS and spend some $$ on new Rapala baits
I used to use them but we have a bajillion pike in our lake and they tear 'em apart (ie bite the tail off and there goes the action)
Im liking the gobi's, and the live pike! Should work out great next summer!
Happy birthday bro  fishermen are sooooooo easy to buy gifts for.....lol
thats right you can never have enough tackle rods reels etc   even though fishermen only use 40% of their tackle 10% of the time

I can second the good feelings about the goby's they are showing up in the stomachs of lots of fish, from Walleye to some of the trout and Salmon. They seem also be favorite of Bass..   Enjoy..the "gifts".

I like the one's that are close to the live minnow you have there.  I have them in perch and walleye and catch walleye chucking those in the evening.  Most of those swimming baits that have the treble hook as well I like.  Happy belated as well...
all aboard the rock and roll train  happy birthday sonny jim
